view.title: Adversary attempts demand/hold abuse
view.subtitle: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

blocks.title: Adversary Hold Abuse completed
blocks.message: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.

error.message: You are not a member of this biz.

data.instruction: Upload snapshots for critical steps and submit final markdown report summarizing pass/fail and discovered gaps.
data.expectedResult: Run has persisted report + snapshots in project directory and indexed metadata in DB.

data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.
